text: Obudde bwe bwawungeera Yesu n’abayigirizwa be ne bafuluma mu kibuga.11:19 Abalambuzi abajjanga ku mikolo egy’enjawulo mu Yerusaalemi, baali beetaaga okugula ebisolo eby’okuwaayo ku mbaga ezo ng’ebiragiro bwe byali ebyabaweebwa mu mateeka. Abasuubuzi baali bafudde oluggya Bannamawanga we baakuŋŋaaniranga mu Yeekaalu akatale, ekyali ekikyamu
